text: Bierné-les-Villages is a commune of 1,249 people (2017). It is found in the region Pays de la Loire in the Mayenne department in the northwest of France. The municipality was created on 1 January 2019 and consists of the former communes of Bierné (the seat), Argenton-Notre-Dame, Saint-Laurent-des-Mortiers and Saint-Michel-de-Feins.Arrêté préfectoral 14 November 2018 == References == Category:2019 establishments in France Category:Communes in Mayenne
title: Bierné-les-Villages
